alert.note: Alert for Greater Greenville; Laurens; Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Laurens, southeastern Greenville and south central Spartanburg Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Laurens, or 5 miles northeast of Ware Shoals, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Simpsonville, Fountain Inn, Woodruff, Gray Court, Ware Shoals, Princeton, Hickory Tavern and Fork Shoals. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
